Welcome to the WWW server of our computer science division. This is a preliminary draft.

Organizational Overview

The computer science faculty consists of the following departments:
  • Technische Informatik (Prof. Kopetz) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
    • Echtzeitsysteme und Softwaretechnologie (Prof. Kopetz)
    • VLSI Entwurf (Prof. Grünbacher)
  • Automation (Prof. Schildt) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
    • Automatisierungssysteme (Prof. Schildt) [Teaching]
    • Mustererkennung und Bildverarbeitung (Prof. Kropatsch)
  • Informationssysteme (Prof. Gottlob) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
    • Verteilte Systeme (Prof. Jazayeri)
    • Datenbanken und Expertensysteme (Prof. Gottlob)
    • Wissensbasierte Systeme
  • Computersprachen (Prof. Leitsch) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
    • Programmiersprachen und Übersetzerbau (Prof. Brockhaus)
    • Anwendungen der Formalen Logik (Prof. Leitsch)
  • Institute of Computer Graphics (Prof. Barth) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
    • Algorithmen und Programmiermethodik (Prof. Barth)
    • Visualisierung und Animation (Prof. Purgathofer)
  • Gestaltungs- und Wirkungsforschung (Prof. Fleissner) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
    • Computer Supported Cooperative Work (CSCW) (Prof. Wagner)
    • Sozialkybernetik (Social Cybernetics) (Prof. Fleissner)
  • Softwaretechnik (Prof. Tjoa) [Teaching] [Research] [Staff/Organization] [X.500]
Here you get a look at the responsibilites.

Also, we run a Computer Science Lab.

Additionally, we maintain a server of publications by the School of Computer Science.

Teaching and Studying

You can study computer science here at theVienna University of Technology according to this teaching program.

However, you should also have a look at the specification of the Studienkommission (german).

Information about courses you may find

  • Who does which course? (german)
  • What are the courses about? (german)

If you don't like Vienna, you may also study computer science in

  • Johannes-Kepler-University (Linz)
  • University Klagenfurt
  • University of Salzburg

Research and Development

Information about the R&D efforts at our university can be found in the research documentation (FODOK).
